tasks.task: Perform the first pass identification of potential diagram structures as defined in the diagram_verification_process.xml file.
For each identified potential diagram, perform the second pass verification against the strict criteria.
Analyze the context surrounding each potential diagram to ensure accurate classification.
For verified diagrams, ensure you capture the full description, including all elements and relationships.
If no structures meet the criteria for a diagram after the two-pass verification, respond ONLY with the not_found_response as specified.
